attributes.action: ensure that adequate and timely provision is dedicated to clearing the roads and footpaths during periods of frost and snow thereby limiting avoidable falls and other accidents leading to unnecessary hospitalization and cost to the already stretched NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the current cold snap with icy roads and footpaths there have been many
avoidable accidents leading to significant injuries as a result of for example falls
In our hospital this has lead to an extra burden of work for the doctors and nursing staff leading to cancellation of elective cases due to work load and also to a reduced workforce due to injury
We should look to countries viz Canada and the Scandinavian countries for effective solutions and implement hem without delay
